title: Hockey-the Skills Revolution
brief_description: This program demonstrates the latest techniques and skills using the Australian National Team players and their coach, Richard Aggiss. Receiving skills, possession skills, elimination skills, passing skills, goal scoring, penalty strokes, tackles and goal keeping are all demonstrated by world champions Charlesworth, Walsh, Bell, Hazelhurst, Snowden and Berce. Endorsed by the Australian Hockey Association.
